thread.section_title: Hotel Fontaines du Luxembourg - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Disappointing stay
thread.title_full: Disappointing stay - Review of Hotel Fontaines du Luxembourg, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Lucie D
title: Disappointing stay
text:
We stayed at the hotel for 3 nights and had 3 different rooms.
1st one on 4th floor, tiny room with poor light, no wi-fi (a bit annoying for a business trip), mold in the shower with limestone on the shower head and cold water tap non functional.
The next day, hotel employees were nice and offered us another room on the 1st floor.
Bigger room with way more light and cleaner than the previous one despite of the dirty heater in the bathroom were the clean towels were placed. Anyway, had a nice sleep in this room until I got bitten by a red ant and found many of them in the room.
Again, the staff was nice and moved us to a superior room (which was nice) and offered us breakfast on the next day.
